name: language of work or name
compound: [OBJ_LABEL] is a language and it was used to write [SUBJ_LABEL].
complex: [OBJ_LABEL] is a language, which was used to write [SUBJ_LABEL].
compound-complex: [OBJ_LABEL] is a language in which many works were written in and it was also used to write [SUBJ_LABEL].
